As the pace of technology growth and the use of many applications, there is a requirement in an industry that everyone has to move towards the use of technology is a must. Mainly an enterprise to keep themselves on a competitive edge in the market they should adopt the new or existing technology. The education industry is not an exception for this kind of changes, and it is a must to use a management system to manage their existing workflows in their organisation which are done manually in the past or with limited systems (e.g. accounting packages). Apart from the simple accounting packages and attendance system used for the employees, the chosen full-fledged school management system might help to improve the workflow within the organisation, cut cost and increase the efficiency of availability of data for everyone.
